title: Marouane IL IDRISSI
text:
Bio
I am a Postdoctoral Fellow affiliated with the Département de Mathématiques at Université du Québec à Montréal and Institut Intelligence et Données at Université Laval, and an Associate Researcher at Obvia.
I am part of the teams of Arthur Charpentier (UQÀM) and Marie-Pier Côté (ULaval).
I hold a PhD in Applied Mathematics from Université de Toulouse in collaboration with EDF R&D and supervised by Jean-Michel Loubes, Fabrice Gamboa, Nicolas Bousquet and Bertrand Iooss.
I am interested in all aspects of machine learning interpretability and especially of non-linear models with dependent features.

Statistical Learning • XAI • Uncertainty Quantification • Sensitivity Analysis • Probability Theory • Cooperative game theory • Functional analysis




Students
Two internship opportunities (Summer 2026): MITACS Globalink
Keyword search: interpretability / Faculty Province: Québec / Faculty University: Université du Québec à Montréal
